title: What song first comes to mind when hearing the word 'Indian'? - Quora

response.answer_text: And another splitting headache when Coyote, Fox, Raven, and Wolf all arrived with different answers, some brought more than one.  "Blinded by the Light" by Manfred Mann's Earth Band. ("Madman drummers, bummers, Indians in the Summer")  "Cowboys and Indians" by M (Robin Scott)  "Cowboys And Indians" by Nik Kershaw  "Half Breed" by Cher. ("My father married a pure Cherokee")  "Indian Girl" by The Rolling Stones  "Indian Reservation" by Don Fardon  "The Witch Queen Of New Orleans" by Redbone (The first Native American rock/cajun group to have a #1 single internationally)
